comment: First math class I didn't enjoy. If you're weak in math, do not take this professor. He moves fast when teaching and his math modeling is very confusing. He thinks he's helping you when he tries to explain something but not at all. I'm sorry..

Professor Womack is the best professor I've had so far- he teaches material in a manner that everyone can understand. Open notes on tests (during summer semester) and is willing to help you understand in any way possible. TAKE HIM if you are awful at math!

Very nice teacher. However, you must keep up with studying! If you struggle with math, I would not recommend taking him due to the fact that his lessons can be unclear at times. But, if you study hard and you practice the math problems he gives you before each test, you will do fine.
The content is fairly easy but he makes things way more confusing than they need to be. Attendance is 20% of your grade so go! It will help your grade big time!
I love him! He is so nice! Makes little jokes and they are funny! I made a A in his class. 80% test and 20% showing up! Study and do your work and you should get an A!

Mr. Womack..I took him for three nours of math.three hours of anything is nearly impossible to retain-especially math...he does teach and reteach, and answers questions. He makes a lot of little mistakes..doesnt reply to emails...nice guy, i think that if i had him any other time instead of one day for such a long time i would enjoy him a lot more.
He is a Amazing teacher! He teaches with clarity and he takes some of the questions from the worksheets and put them on the test. Made an A.
Great teacher . Tries to be funny but we all just laugh at him. But he does teach well

Good professor.  The assignments are clear and as long as you go to class and do the work you should be able to make an A.  He is also very available to his students and willing to help.  I would highly recommend him to anyone, especially if math is not your thing.  Also, he posts everything online so you don't have to buy the $200 textbook.
Easy going, really wants students to learn. Very patient and has a sense of humor - always good in a math class!
So easy! He re teaches almost everything. I actually got bored in his class many times from how easy it was. Definitely take him.

Professor Womack is a good teacher that shows you how to do things you already knew, but in ways you may have not seen them before...ways your future students may see them. I personally didn't use the book. Good notes in class should suffice. Goofy guy, good professor, easy yet useful class. I'll be holding onto the notes from this class for sure.
TAKE HIM! don't use the book and if you show up take notes and study you will receive the grade you deserve! Final was the hardest part so make sure to get a good grade on the first two!

I signed up for Friday class of 3 hours of math.  Bad choice of 1 class of math once a week! He is very fast with lectures-hard to keep up with. I print out notes from online. I was struggling bc I had a disability. I asked him what can I do to pass this class. He let me come 3 days a week to get thru this class. He is a very nice man. I made a B.

AWESOME professor!!  He really knows what he is doing and teaches you a lot!!  If you come to class you will be fine!!  He doesn't use the book, so don't buy it!!  My recommendation is that you print off the chapter from his personal website.  It's very helpful in class and studying for exams!!  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED !!

Awesome teacher and loved his class.  I'd recommend to everyone to take his class.  It's easy to do well in his class if you pay attention.  Make sure you go to class everyday attendance is 25% of your grade.  He's an awesome teacher and would take him again.

Mr.Womack is a great professor!!! He introduces you to interesting and new ways of understanding math. Taught me interesting ways to help students laern math.. I would take him again if I could. He is highly recommended..
Great teacher. Really wants his students to succeed. Class seems elementary at first but for obvious reasons since in is for elementary ed.He is quick to respond to all emails.
Don't waste your money on the book. It's mostly on line on his website. Great teacher, but dry sense of humor.
Take him!! He is crystal clear and explains the problems in a different way from the text. He is very good at getting you to see the sense that math makes. Great teacher!!!
Great teacher!
Easy easy class. Don't waste your money on the book he gives you everything you need on the website. If you go to class and work through the study guide you'll get an A! Great guy!

Very easy class. Tests come straight from study guides that he goes over in class in extreme detail. Course ended 2 weeks early because we completed all the material. 5 easy tests, no final. Don't buy the book! He puts it all online.

He is such a sweet, nice guy. Class is easy if you come and pay attention. Attendence is not mandatory. Any questions you have, he will take the time to FULLY (sometimes too much) explain the answer. Take him!
He NEVER kept us the full class time

He NEVER kept us the full class time - most often just 1/2 time on Friday morning. He alsways offered a mini review right before each test. Esay tests if you listen to his lecture and do homework. Best math teacher I ever had! Math tests are in line with GACE - so it helped me pass math portion of GACE.He was very nice to everyone, and funny!

He is an amazing guy and a wonderful teacher. He takes the time to over over problems you do not understand as many times as needed. Test Come straight from the practice questions online. I would certainly take him all over again. You leave the class with an undersanding of material covered.
Very easy class.  Great professor.  Would love to take him for another class.  Makes the test easy if you do your homework & study guide.

Math is my thing, so I found this class VERY easy.  I saw others that were not getting it so easily.  I thought he was a good professor and a nice guy.  I would not buy the book!!!  He uses homework problems that you can print off from his webpage.  He makes little jokes that I don't think everyone gets.  I would take him again.

Very nice guy. Easy class. Sometimes he made concepts harder than they had to be. He doesn't take up homework but you have a quiz pretty much every week.  They are easy and help you to stay on track. Write down every problem he puts on the board, because they will most likely be on the test. I would take him again.

Confusing at times but does take time to review homework before quizzes and tests. Teaches with attitude that this is basic math from high school but does not consider the adult learners who have been out of school for several years. If you are comfortable with TI83 and have not been out of school for long, this class would be easy for you.

This guy makes even the simplest concepts hard because he does NOT know how to teach! Gives new material before quizzes and tests-which makes it worse. Quiz almost every class. Take someone else for this class.

I chose this prof based on  reviews here. I ignored the bad ones and figured it was just individual preference. MISTAKE. He is the most confusing, difficult teacher I've ever had. Talks down to you if you ask a question, makes even simple concepts hard because he is so confusing. Not just me either. Many others in my class agreed. Do not recommend

Great professor.  I would take another class from him any day. Works hard to make sure you understand how to work the problems.  If you are a math person, it is a very easy A. There are lots of quizzes, but they are all very easy.
Nice guy, very soft spoken,will go out of his way to help you. Do homework and you'll succeed in his class.

What a GREAT PROF! Not only did I get an A.. I was reintroduced to math concepts I hadn't seen since high school. His quizzes are easy and help your grade tremendously. I took the class on Fridays and recommend it.. he was funny, material went by quickly and everyone seemed to enjoy him! Good teacher and nice guy for anyone struggling with math.

Funny, helpful and an overall great professor. I would definitely recommend him. I took the 11am Friday course and got a high A. Quiz every class but they are super easy and help your average. Tests are pretty straight forward--just study the quizzes and homework. Even people who have a hard time with math should do well in his class!

He was the worst professor I have ever taken. Not only does he expect for you to know the material before reviewing (not teaching) it, he will not assist you with additional help.  He was also very insensitive to my learning disability! DO NOT TAKE HIM!!!

Took him over the summer.  This guy's heart just wasn't in it.  Zoomed through the material.  Encouraged us to use cheat sheets.  Answered questions with, "Read the book.  It's in the book".  I somehow got an "A" but didn't retain one bit of the information.  Nice guy.  Witty.  Impatient.  Terse.  Wants to leave class as eagerly as the students.

I definitely reccommend taking Tom's class for any math course at KSU!! I was in his 2.5hour Friday class and it actually went by really fast ~ AND I got an A (which I haven't gotton in math since like the 4th grade...) He's very descriptive & always willing to help.. I even found his corny math humor to be quite entertaining, even Friday at 8am!

YEAH, Tom is an awesome Math prof. He explains very well and is willing to go over things more than one if you don't get it. He is very easy to get in touch with out of the classroom and will work with you to help you get an A. Pulled an A for his class, that's all that mattters!

He is very helpful and pleasant to be around. I never dreaded going to this class. He explains math very clearly and well help with any questions or concerns. I highly reccomend him. And plus he tells cute little jokes!
Very good professor! His lectures can get a little lengthy, but at least he explains everything VERY thoroughly~ and if you show improvement during the course, he will reward you.

VERY GOOD TEACHER!!! I got an A in his class. It's the only A i've ever gotten in a math class. His lectures can get a little long but he really does explain things well. And, he lets you use notes. The quizzes were helpful because it meant that your grade wasn't totally dependent on tests. By far, the best math teacher I've ever had.
Great Instructor. Easy to understand. Goes over eveything you need before each test. Lower weighted quizes taken before each test match the test format and difficulty exactly making it easy to study.
He lets you use notes on tests and quizzes which is awesome.  He explains things very well.  He is a very nice man!
An excellent professor.  Dr. Womack explains things very well, and will always return emails within 24 hours.  Tests and quizzes are fairly easy, and his website is very helpful.

I really like this professor, he seemed so calm and relaxing.He just makes you feel at ease. Check out and do some of the problems that he puts on his website,that's really helpful. Just pay attention and study and you'll be fine.

He was an awesome teacher!  Math doesn't come very easily to me but he always explained things really well and made sure everyone understood.  He's very flexible and has a goofy sense of humor.  He tries to make the class fun and entertaining.  Lots of ways to make easy grades!  Take him if you can!

It's a great teacher. He is very hepful with any questions that can arise and always stay after class if we need any help. Very open mind and you can even email him any type of questions he will be glad to return your anwers.
great teacher, very helpful

Dude, he talks exactly like Bob Ross. You know, that guy that made paintings in a 30 minute television show "The Joy of Painting". I love that show...he has a very relaxing voice. And this teacher makes math seem easy just the way Bob Ross made painting seem easy. I liked this class.

Great teacher. He makes math easy and has a great website with tons of study questions and helpful hints. He grades tests/quizes within a few days and posts all grades on line. final exam is not cummulative. Open notes for TI85 calculator.

I do not feel that Mr. Womack explains how to work the problems well. I spent more time learning in the math lab. He gives problems to practice for test but never gives answers. I never knew if I even answered correctly. Not a class for someone out of school for awhile.
Moves fast and talks in a monotone voice. Discourages questions! Sometimes asks if there are any and then puts the person down for asking!!

He is an awesome teacher. He gives tons of examples and allows you to have a formula sheet for all the quizzes and a cheat sheet with your notes for the midterm and any other test. He is fun and funny and makes fun of himself when he makes a mistake.
Great teacher- very easy.  This was my 1st math class in 14 years.  He made it a breeze!  If you fear math, he'll make your time in math class a sinch.

I had him in Summer School.  He was soooo easy.  There were three test and as long as you did well on the first two tests you don't have to take the last one.  The test are open book.  All you need to do is the homework.  You can usually do it in class.
He's really strnage . . . but nice enough I guess
